Articles.Content:
I'm currently doing a mission to Eeloo, and am being re-acquainted with the time involved waiting for one orbit to complete at those distances.

My request is to be able to warp much quicker.  

To prevent unintentional warping past your target point, I suggest only allowing faster warp multiples when using the 'warp to here' feature in map view.

As a side request, a faster physics warp when using ion engines would be helpful too.
BetterTimeWarp is exactly what you are looking for
Self-promotion for WarpEverywhere (which still works in 1.12 I just haven't bothered updating anything)

I should have guessed, there's a mod for that!

I generally play 100% stock, and then there's the console players who aren't able to load mods.  I think this would be useful to incorporate into stock KSP.  As it looks like development of KSP has ended, the suggestion is more for the folks working on KSP2.

However, I've used mods before- KAC and TWP because they were so useful.  I think the mods mentioned by @Superfluous J and @Staticalliam7 fall into that category.  As in why isn't this already present?

Well as for removing height limits, I have no idea. I *thought* they actaully did that and only set periapsis limits but maybe I'm misremembering. I don't actually play anymore

As for giving you a higher number... yeah they should do that for sure. Though as you say they won't.
